Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: There were 125 infectious episodes in 116 cancer patients receiving myelosuppressive chemotherapy .

| Chemical |
| --- |

In this paragraph, the only chemical entity mentioned is "myelosuppressive chemotherapy." This term refers to a type of chemotherapy that suppresses the production of blood cells in the bone marrow.
